entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:11 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Earlton Airport 06:05 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow

Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 83 %

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
